greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of binary matrices with nonzero rows, a total of n ones and each column with the same number of ones and columns in nonincreasing lexicographic order.
comment: The condition that the columns be in nonincreasing order is equivalent to considering nonequivalent matrices up to permutation of columns.
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Jan 23 2020
